text: I tried on the client project to click "other templates" when selecting a template and the templates appeared!(It didn't work on the project's starter template)

Hello Guys, I need some help regarding HS tracking code for chat icon. Is this the right channel for that?
I have an app where I added the HS tracking code in my head section under script tag. And my app gets open in shopify as an iframe.
In the chatflows also added my iframe src as a target website url but the chat icon not coming always for different stores.
when I open my app in shopify it was not coming until I reload the page although checked in the iframe document head section script is present
Anyone any idea why this could happen?
